item.title: Chris add a quote by Mutant Enemy/Joss Whedon
item.description: "Half of writing history is hiding the truth." -- Mutant Enemy/Joss Whedon

item.title: Chris add a quote by Errico Malatesta
item.description: "Hate does not produce love, and by hate one cannot remake the world." -- Errico Malatesta

item.title: Chris add a quote by George Lucas
item.description: "No! Try not. Do, or do not. There is no try." -- George Lucas

item.title: Chris add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Between a high, solid wall and an egg that breaks against it, I will always stand on the side of the egg." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Chris add a quote by Huey Newton
item.description: "â€Ž"revolutionary suicide does not mean that i and my comrades have a death wish; it means just the opposite. we have such a strong desire to live with hope and human dignity that existence without them is impossible. when reactionary forces crush us, we must move against these forces, even at the risk of death." -- Huey Newton

item.title: Chris add a quote by Octavia E. Butler
item.description:
"All that you touch You Change.
All that you Change Changes you.
The only lasting truth is Change.
God is Change." -- Octavia E. Butler

item.title: Chris add a quote by Octavia Butler
item.description: "First forget inspiration. Habit is more dependable. Habit will sustain you whether you're inspired or not. Habit will help you finish and polish your stories. Inspiration won't. Habit is persistence in practice." -- Octavia Butler

item.title: Chris add a quote by Octavia E. Butler
item.description: "People have the right to call themselves whatever they like. That doesn't bother me. It's other people doing the calling that bothers me." -- Octavia E. Butler

item.title: Chris add a quote by Walter Mosley
item.description: "The job of the writer is to take a close and uncomfortable look at the world they inhabit, the world we all inhabit, and the job of the novel is to make the corpse stink." -- Walter Mosley
